msItem.title: Riyāḍ al-Firdaws
ریاض الفردوس
msItem.note: Folio one, recto: Stamp, the name filled in in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by John Romer Esq A General History of Persia, from the earliest times to the death of the Safavid Shah Sulaiman in A.H. 1076, completed in Jumada II, 1082. Headings and punctuation in red. On European paper, some cream, some blue, with various watermarks. MS written for Sardar Jan Rumir Sahib Bahadur
msItem.incipit: Jawahir-i zawahir-i hamdi ki dast-farsudah-i auham-i muqaddasah nagardidah.

listBibl.bibl: vStorey, i, p. 237. No other MS is noted by Storey.
For the provenance see Donations Register for November 18 1848.

bindingDesc.p: Dark nrown leather Indian binding with blind stamped decoration, the spine later replaced and with tooled catalogue No etc.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
